title: Please Help...!
content:
hi...  
it is look like "Clarendon"..but not...!! Can anyone please identify this font...?? see attached image...!  
Thanks in advance.

Solved By:

author: super17d

comments.content:
An artificially fattened and condensed version of Century Schoolbook Bold or New Century Schoolbook Bold is the closest I could find:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/century-schoolbook/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131733/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/century-schoolbook/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/century-schoolbook/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/new-century-schoolbook/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131733/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/new-century-schoolbook/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/new-century-schoolbook/")
